borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: No development shall commence, including any works of demolition, until a Construction Logistics Plan has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  The Plan shall be designed to minimise deliveries of materials and export of any waste materials within the times of peak traffic congestion on the local road network.  The Plan shall be implemented in accordance with the approved details and thereafter maintained.
<p class="MsoNormal">The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.<br></p>

<p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li>PP-13251503v1&nbsp;Site Location Plan&nbsp;19-Jul-2024</li><li>HD/RM8 3JU/PROP-GROUND REV A&nbsp;Amended Proposed Ground Floor Plan&nbsp;9th August 2024</li><li>HD/RM8 3JU/PROP-ROOF REV A&nbsp;Amended Proposed Roof Plan&nbsp;9th August 2024</li><li>HD/RM8 3JU/SITE REV A&nbsp;Amended Site Plan&nbsp;9th August 2024</li><li>HD/RM8 3JU/SECTION REV A&nbsp;Amended Typical Section AA&nbsp;9th August 2024</li><li>HD/RM8 3JU/EXT-ELEVATION REV A&nbsp;Amended Existing Elevations&nbsp;9th August 2024</li><li>HD/RM8 3JU/EXT-FIRST REV A&nbsp;Amended Existing First Floor Plan&nbsp;9th August 2024</li><li>HD/RM8 3JU/EXT-GROUND REV A&nbsp;Amended Existing Ground Floor Plan&nbsp;9th August 2024</li><li>HD/RM8 3JU/EXT-ROOF REV A&nbsp;Amended Existing Roof Plan&nbsp;9th August 2024</li><li>HD/RM8 3JU/PROP-ELEVATION REV A&nbsp;Amended Proposed Elevations&nbsp;9th August 2024</li><li>HD/RM8 3JU/PROP-FIRST REV A&nbsp;Amended Proposed First Floor Plan&nbsp;9th August 2024<br></li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.<br>
description: Demolition of existing single storey side and rear extension and the construction of a two storey side extension and a part two storey part single storey rear extension
